statements: UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = 50, back_in_stock = TRUE WHERE id = 1
UPDATE products SET name = 'New Product Name', stock_quantity = 100 WHERE id = 2
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity + 10, back_in_stock = TRUE WHERE id = 100
UPDATE products SET name = 'New Product Name', stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 5 WHERE id = 200
UPDATE products SET name='Product ABC', stock=100 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE notifications SET message='Notification: Stock Replenished', product_id=1 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE products SET stock = 20, name = 'Updated Product Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE notifications SET message = 'New Notification Message' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE product_table SET stock_quantity = 50, back_in_stock = TRUE WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE notification_table SET notification_message = 'Product back in stock!', notification_timestamp = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE product_table SET stock_quantity = 100, back_in_stock = TRUE WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE notification_table SET notification_message = 'Back in stock now!', notification_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = 100 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE stock_updates SET previous_quantity = 50, new_quantity = 70, update_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = 100, is_back_in_stock = true WHERE id = 'f7a34a04-7c4f-4f86-9368-e52c25bc5263';

UPDATE notifications SET notification_type = 'Back in Stock', notification_date = '2022-01-20 09:00:00', message = 'Product is now back in stock' WHERE product_id = 'f7a34a04-7c4f-4f86-9368-e52c25bc5263';
UPDATE products SET is_back_in_stock = TRUE WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE stock_notifications SET notification_sent = '2023-01-30 10:00:00' WHERE notification_id = 3;
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 1, is_back_in_stock = true WHERE product_name = 'iPhone X';
UPDATE stock_notifications SET notification_sent = now(), notification_message = 'Product is back in stock' WHERE product_id = 1;
